attributes.action: Classify Cigarettes and Alchohol as Class B Contolled Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cigarettes and alcohol (both of which I enjoy) are patently more harmful, to a larger number of people, than canabis.

Given the damage that they do, it is obvious that they should be more strictly controlled than canabis.
